blogs.title: The best blogs in the world
blogs.body: This is the way that the lord has made, we will rejoice and be glad in it
blogs.author: Goliath

blogs.title: The second best blogs in the world
blogs.body: Rejoice and see peace flow like a river. We will rejoice and be glad in it
blogs.author: David

blogs.title: The thirdd best blogs in the world
blogs.body: Have faith and know that my name is The Lord. Rejoice and see peace flow like a river. We will rejoice and be glad in it
blogs.author: Solomon
